[[Image:Godsgrace Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Godsgrace on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Godsgrace''' is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]]. The castle is located in eastern Dorne close to where the [[Greenblood]] is born from the [[Scourge]] and the [[Vaith (river)|Vaith]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Godsgrace is the seat of House Allyrion.
